name: Kingfish
description: Hello everyone! "Kingfish" is my first original video game. "Kingfish" is effectively a Flappy Bird clone but underwater. The gameplay is quite different from Flappy Bird though as there are options to speed up or slow down swimming, fast-fall and even shoot out little air bubbles to destroy certain obstacles. The game has four difficulties and even one easter egg screen you can try to find, it's a bit of a schizo-post.
